docs.snippet: The Netherlands survived a nerve-wracking penalty shootout against Costa Rica on Saturday, with substitute goalkeeper Tim Krul the unlikely hero, to set up a World Cup semi-final against Argentina after the South Americans beat Belgium 1-0....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Netherlands survived a nerve-wracking penalty shootout against Costa Rica on Saturday, with substitute goalkeeper Tim Krul the unlikely hero, to set up a World Cup semi-final against Argentina after the South Americans beat Belgium 1-0.

headline.main: Dutch Keeper Krul a Shootout Hero, Argentina Await
headline.print_headline: Dutch Keeper Krul a Shootout Hero, Argentina Await

docs.snippet: Neymar's exit from the World Cup due to a back injury left Brazilians shocked and angered on Friday, darkening the mood after the hosts' 2-1 win over Colombia in the quarter-finals had sparked nationwide celebrations....
docs.lead_paragraph: Neymar's exit from the World Cup due to a back injury left Brazilians shocked and angered on Friday, darkening the mood after the hosts' 2-1 win over Colombia in the quarter-finals had sparked nationwide celebrations.

headline.main: Brazil Shocked, Angered by Neymar's World Cup Injury
headline.print_headline: Brazil Shocked, Angered by Neymar's World Cup Injury

docs.snippet: The Argentines didn't need a late winner from Lionel Messi this time, settling in to protect a 1-0 margin against Belgium that earned them a first trip to the World Cup semifinals in 24 years....

headline.main: Messi Guides Argentina Into Semis, Dutch Scrape In

docs.snippet: By the time she graduated from Cedarville University, a Christian college in Ohio, in 2011, Sarah Jones was well down the path to atheism and feminism....
docs.lead_paragraph: By the time she graduated from Cedarville University, a Christian college in Ohio, in 2011, Sarah Jones was well down the path to atheism and feminism.
docs.abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column profiles Sarah Jones, daughter of fundamental Christians and graduate of a Christian college who found herself on a path to atheism and feminism; Jones now works for liberal advocacy group Americans United for Separation of Church and State, who sent her to await Supreme Court's decision in Burwell v Hobby Lobby.

headline.main: Taking on Hobby Lobby After Turning Away From a Religious Past
headline.print_headline: Taking On Hobby Lobby After Turning Away From a Religious Past
